captions.text: (whistling)
(shower starts)
(vacuum starts)
- Did you take out the trash?
- It's your turn to take out the trash.

- Sarah, how long do you
think you're going to be?
- Ashley!
(vacuum starts)
- Sarah!
- Ew, what?
This is gross!
Ashley this is the best...

Ashley, best parts coming
up, it's coming up.
- I know, I'm watching.

- Okay but you're on your
phone you're not like...
- Okay.
- Hey have you seen my thin mints?
Ashley!

- Sarah you've been in
there for like 20 minutes.
No I took out the trash yesterday.
- I take out the trash every day.
- Ugh.
- Turn off the lights you're an adult.
You can turn off your lights.

- There's no lights, how am
I supposed to see anything?
- It was paid, there was not...
I get, yeah I see what you're...
(vacuum starts)
Ashley!
Here he goes!

Okay why did you go back
you're missing the robot!

- Literally every night.
- It's dark in here, god.
What do we live in a cave?
That's why Sarah's so pale all the time.

No lights, how am I
supposed to see anything?
That's much better.

comments.text:
Top 10 annoying things that annoy you about your roommate:
1-When you both want to shower at the same time.
2-When one of them wants to have all the lights on or all the lights off.
3-Can't agree on room temperature.
4-Morning Person and/or Night owl for a roommate
5-Never cleans up after themselves or is a clean freak
6-Invites noisy friends over all the time
7-Taking turns for buying toilet paper, taking out trash, etc.
8-You know your roommate's sex life
9-They use your stuff without permission
10-They use up the entire fridge, cabinets, shelves, etc.﻿

comments.author: For Ashe

comments.text:
I remember having two rommies for just one year (yeah stupid mandatory 
freshman dorm crap). One rommie was thankfully considerate and nice. The 
other one...well she turned the sink into a dumpster for weeks, didn't take 
out trash bags until I told her several times, and secretly drank my Brita 
and failed to fill it up multiple times. One thing I still don't understand 
is why she never washed her little tower for the whole academic year. I 
mean c'mon that's freaking gross and it can cause eye infections or more 
pimples!!! The last thing that got on my nerves was when she ignored my 
warning about the school placing penalty fee for small paint smudges on the 
wall. Well, we three all got charged and this problem could have been 
avoided if she just cleaned that bloody wall! Remember kids, the toilet 
paper issue can also turn into a nightmare. If you're neat and organized 
you might have bigger trouble finding neat and organized folks. Oh and 
religious differences can spark conflicts and I did see some brewing 
tensions between Catholic and Protestant students because of some minor 
theological arguments. It's always unwise to criticize someone based on his 
or her religious beliefs because that certainly is one of the main reasons 
why so many people verbally and physically destroy each other.﻿

being really dark, I find it so bright for myself to fall asleep. I need 
the room to be pitch black.﻿

comments.author: Tahmina Begum

comments.text:
I had roommates in high school and that was a rough road, but as an adult, 
I've never had problems with roommates.  I understand-its a challenge 
sometimes to have a roommate, and i strong suggest you chose roommates very 
carefully. I was fortunate I was very blessed with good roommates as an 
adult. 

From my experience, everyone did the dishes promptly or if we saw dishes 
lying there for a long time, everyone took turns doing the dishes because 
everyone had to cook and obviously we  can't cook in a kitchen full of 
dirty dishes. Personally, I don't understand why anyone would eat other 
people's food, because  its a common sense to me that you cannot eat food 
that you didn't buy...come on, we aren't 4 year old any more right?  

As for garbage and recycling, everyone did it together so there was no 
argument of who takes out the trash.  Bills were decided by the landlord so 
everyone payed the same amount. The only thing we had to pay was the 
internet and we were all responsible people by sharing by how many of us 
were there.   ﻿
